name: Tyotus: Ninja Detective
description:
Tyotus: Ninja Detective

Join Ninja Detective Tyotus on his mission to solve the mystery of who killed the President of the D.E.A. Help Tyotus run, jump, shoot and think his way to the truth! Don’t give up! Someone innocent may die on your hands!

How to Play:
During Story: 
Press screen to move through story.
Press buttons to solve puzzles!
Press puzzle pieces to move piece to empty spaces

Runner Levels: 
Jump: Press and Hold the Jump button (on left) to ascend higher. 
Shoot: Press shoot button once to shoot 1 shuriken
Dodge Soldiers at all COSTS
Only land on buildings
